CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1958, pg. A22, reads: " 'Miss Emanon" and Attendants - Shown in center is Miss Gerry Shackelford, who was chosen "Miss Emanon" of 1959 at eh Emanons' ball, Nov. 27. Her attendants were, left, Carole VeLar, and right, Barbara Alston. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young man placing floral headpiece on "Miss Emanon" Gerry Shackelford, standing next to Barbara Alston (Clark) and Carole VeLar, in Webster Hall for Emanons' ball
